section.para: A facility is a credit line available to the borrower whose basis is either a line letter or a credit agreement. A deal consists of one or more facilities. A deal is structured for a company by a bank or group of banks to meet the company's financial needs.
To use the modules in Lending Services, your company must have arranged a deal with the Issuing Bank.

section.title: Facility Landing Page
section.para:
The Facility Landing page displays a list of facilities available to the logged in user.
You can customise the list of columns displayed through SDK.
The following image illustrates the Facility landing page:

listitem.para:
Use this option to initiate a new request for Loan, enter the desired terms of a new loan and submit them to the Issuing Bank of your choice. This function displays a list of facilities, from which you can select a facility to be the subject of your drawdown request.The facilities are grouped based on the deal that they belong to. Use the Advanced Filter option and select the filter criterion from Deal, Currency and Entity to display the required Facilities.
The loan initiation feature is available only to maker user.

section.para: The Advance Filter presents you with various filter options like Deal, Currency and Entity. Enter the relevant search criterion and apply the filter to list all the relevant loan records. You can also select the time frame for which data needs to be fetched.

You can perform the following actions on the listed loan records:
Search: Enter any of the Advance Filter search criterion in the search box to display the required list of loan transactions.
CSV Download: Download the list of loan transactions displayed on the dashboard.
Column Filter: Add the column filter value to narrow down the search criterion for the listed loan transactions.

section.title: Facility Details
section.para: This section describes the information presented on clicking Details icon on any given transaction:

entry.para:
Click on this icon
to display the facility details. The details are categorised under three tabs 'Loans', 'Fees' and 'Sub Limits'. Individual tabs are described below:
Click on Initiate Drawdown button at the top of Details page to initiate a drawdown using this facility.
Click on Instructions icon
at the top of Details page to view the history of events that the transaction has gone through.
Loans: Displays all the loans associated to the facility.
Fees: Displays all the fees applied for the facility.
Sub Limits: Displays the various limits types applicable on the facility. The limits displayed are:
Sub Limits
Risk Limits
Borrower Limits
Currency Limits
